title: Brookings and SCAG Report Exposes Failures in Native Data Collection
combined_text: Brookings and SCAG Report Exposes Failures in Native Data Collection. yahoo.com.
summary: A Brookings-SCAG report reveals significant undercounting of Native populations, distorting data accuracy. This flawed data leads to misallocation of resources impacting crucial community services; almost 30% of Native Americans are undercounted. Using better data collection methods can improve resource allocation and accurately reflect Native communities' needs.
